message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I value your interest, $1,300,000 is still below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I am unable to meet your new price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,325,000. I hope this proposal will be more in line with your expectations.
Bob, I see we're getting closer. I'm willing to meet you halfway on this. Let's settle on $1,337,500.  This is a fair price that allows for a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your offer, but I am still not able to meet the price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,330,000. I believe this price is fair and allows for a reasonable profit for you while staying within my budget.
